top_comments.comment: This tablet is beautiful than the picture used for the request. Thanks for sharing your talents with us. I absolutely love this table.

WoW! Beautiful. I agree with everyone else, you need your own T.V. Show! I absolutely love watching your videos because they are DYI projects, but they are in budget. Can't go wrong with Dollar Tree, Thank you so much, Be Blessed!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Please, I would like to know where I buy the bowls?
I think I can tackle this one. I got everything so far except the PVC lattice and clear glue  and I will be purchasing those items soon.
You are so talented and creative...Thank You for sharing your insight.  💕
So nice! U should have covered everything in that morrow paper
